com.example.cmput301f20t18

Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.cmput301f20t18.Book

  • public class Book
extends java.lang.Object
    A book object represents a book within our system Books are owned by users, and can be transferred to others
    Author:
    deinum, Sean Butler
    See Also:
    User
